meta.name: twitter-algorithm-optimizer
meta.title: Twitter Algorithm Optimizer
meta.description: Analyze and optimize tweets for maximum reach using Twitter's open-source algorithm insights. Rewrite and edit user tweets to improve engagement and visibility

original_definition.skill_description: Analyze and optimize tweets for maximum reach using Twitter's open-source algorithm insights. Rewrite and edit user tweets to improve engagement and visibility based on how the recommendation system ranks content.

actions.name: Identify Core Message
actions.description: Extract the single most important thing the tweet communicates and target action

actions.name: Map to Algorithm Strategy
actions.description: Determine Real-graph (followers), SimClusters (community), TwHIN (identity), Tweepcred (authority) fit

actions.name: Optimize for Engagement Signals
actions.description: Enhance for likes, replies, retweets, bookmarks triggers

actions.name: Check Against Negatives
actions.description: Verify no block/report risks, identity confusion, engagement bait, inflammatory language

actions.name: Generate Optimized Tweet
actions.description: Rewrite tweet applying all optimization strategies

actions.name: Explain Optimization
actions.description: Explain why changes improve algorithmic ranking

rules.name: Validate Tweet Provided
rules.condition_expression: User provided tweet draft to optimize

directives.name: Tweet Optimized
directives.description: Tweet rewritten with algorithm optimization and explanation

directives.name: Algorithm Models Knowledge
directives.description: Real-graph (follower interaction), SimClusters (community detection), TwHIN (user-content mapping), Tweepcred (reputation scoring)

directives.name: Engagement Signals Knowledge
directives.description: Explicit: likes, replies, retweets, quotes. Implicit: profile visits, clicks, time spent, bookmarks. Negative: blocks, mutes, unfollows

directives.name: Reply Trigger Strategy
directives.description: Ask direct questions, create debate, request opinions, share incomplete thoughts

directives.name: Authenticity Principle
directives.description: Algorithm rewards genuine engagement, not manipulation. Quality over virality.
